projects.title: Projects of
projects.subtitle: Real-world case studies showing business outcomes

ecommerce.title: E-Commerce Platform
ecommerce.problem: Legacy systems causing slow load times (8s+) and abandoned carts. Monolithic codebase made updates risky and slow.
ecommerce.solution: Microservices architecture with Next.js, redis caching, and Stripe. Implemented CDN, image optimization, and automated testing.
impact: Increased revenue by $2M through 1.2s load time
Cut deployment time from 2 days to 1 hour

analytics.title: Real-Time Analytics Dashboard
analytics.problem: Batch data processing with 24-hour delay. Clients needed real-time insights for critical business decisions.
analytics.solution: Streaming pipeline with Apache Kafka, ClickHouse for analytics, and React with D3.js for visualization. Real-time alerts via WebSockets.
impact: Boosted retention by 35% with actionable insights

mobile.title: Fintech Mobile App
mobile.problem: Slow native app with fragmented user experience across platforms. Maintenance costs were high with two codebases.
mobile.solution: React Native with TypeScript, biometric authentication, and end-to-end encryption. Payment platform integration and regulatory compliance.
impact: Reduced maintenance costs by 60% with single codebase
